description: Nine inches is something many models brag to have but the reality is they must start measuring around their kidney. But every so often, we've been luckily enough to run across a model like Tommy Boy where the nine inches prove to be a bona fide slab a cock meat that hangs down like a thick tree branch that could easily double as seating for four.Tommy is tall, lean a bit reserved at first but really came to life the same time his huge dick did. Not just long, but fat too with head like a helmet and a thick pronounced vein on the underside.Tommy's not a dribbler or even just a shooter: when he fires his load it was like a volcanic eruption. While needing to have the sofa cleaned after I finish filming has happened before, this is the first time I  had to get a spot off the ceiling too.
title: Nine Good Reasons, Scene #01
